title: iOS Developer
tagsAndSkills: Ios Development,UI/UX standards,Core Data,Restful Web Api Development,Core Animation,Web API,UI,API
jobDescription:
Job Description:


We are seeking a highly skilled iOS Developer with 4 to 8 years of experience to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in developing iOS applications, a passion for technology, and excellent communication skills in English.


Key Responsibilities:


Design, develop, and maintain high-quality iOS applications.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.

Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.

Conduct code reviews and ensure adherence to best practices and coding standards.

Troubleshoot and debug to optimize performance.

Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.

Work closely with designers to implement visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces.

Requirements:


Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

4 to 8 years of hands-on experience in iOS development.

Proficiency in Swift and Objective-C.

Strong understanding of the full mobile development life cycle.

Experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, and Core Graphics.

Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services.

Knowledge of other web technologies and UI/UX standards.

Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications.

Experience with third-party libraries and APIs.

Proficient in code versioning tools, such as Git.

Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Excellent communication skills in English, both written and spoken.

Preferred Qualifications:


Experience with continuous integration.

Knowledge of Apples design principles and interface guidelines.

Experience with unit testing and test-driven development (TDD).

Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies.

title: Android Developer

ambitionBoxData.Title: DH Healthcare Software Services India Private Limited (Dedalus) Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out to inform you about an exciting job opportunity that might align with your skills and career aspirations.

We are currently looking for talented individuals to join our team at Dedalus. If you are interested in exploring this opportunity further, we would love to hear from you. Please feel free to share your updated resume with us.

Android Native Developer

Join us as Android Native Developer at Dedalus, one of the World’s leading healthcare technology companies, on our Team in Chennai, India to do the best work of your career and make a profound impact in providing better care for a healthier planet.

What you’ll achieve

An Android native lead developer plays a crucial role in the success of mobile application projects by providing technical expertise, leadership, and strategic direction. You bridge the gap between business objectives and technical execution, ensuring that applications are robust, user-friendly, and delivered on time. Through continuous learning and adaptation, you also drive innovation and improvement within the development team and the broader organization.

You will:

Be highly responsible position involves using established work procedures to analyse, design, develop, implement, maintain, re-engineer and troubleshoot large scale mission critical application, with a focus on scalability, maintainability, security, and performance. Ability to work independently, both on technical & operational aspects is the key.

Take the next step towards your dream career

At Dedalus Life flows through our software. Every day we do something special by helping caregivers and health professionals deliver better care to their served communities. Take the next step in your career that will make a profound impact. Here’s what you’ll need to succeed: 

Essential Requirements 

• Delivering a complete front-end application using Kotlin/JAVA
• Candidate should be familiar with UI Design with Jetpack and Android framework APIs.
• Communicating with external REST/Web APIs. 
• 4 - 6 Yrs Of the total IT Experience. Android Native Development relevant experience minimum 4 yrs. 

Desirable Requirements 

• Familiar with RDBMS, SQL
• Angular HYBRID App development. Familiar with Microservices, Docker.
• Master’s or Bachelor’s degree in computer science, MS, or Engineering.
• Should have experience on designing/developing large scale or mission critical applications, preferably in the field of healthcare.
• Exposure to Mobile platforms iOS development is also added advantages.


We are Dedalus, come join us

Dedalus is committed to providing an engaging, rewarding work experience that reflects the passion our employees bring to our mission of helping clinicians and nurses deliver better care to their served communities.

Our company fosters a culture where employees are encouraged to learn and innovate, and to enable and enhance clinical co-operation and processes while making a meaningful difference for millions of people around the world. Each person is the end point and the starting point of the Group’s activities and the ultimate beneficiary. For this reason, we are so proud of doing our very special jobs each day.

Our company is enriched by a diverse population of 7,600 people in more than 40 countries that work together to innovate and drive better healthcare options for millions of patients around the world. We are the people of Dedalus.

 If you know someone who might be a good fit, kindly forward this email to them as well.

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

title: iOS Developer
jobDescription:
Key Responsibilities:


  • Develop, test, and maintain high-quality iOS applications using Swift.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code with a strong emphasis on quality and scalability.
  • Integrate and manage backend services written in Golang.
  • Work with React for web development and Swift for iOS development when needed.
  • Implement and manage database solutions using MongoDB.
  • Utilize Google Cloud Platform services for deploying and managing applications.
  • Set up and maintain CI/CD pipelines using tools like Concourse.
  • Design and build scalable, fault-tolerant web services and APIs.
  • Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
  • Conduct code reviews and ensure adherence to best practices and coding standards.
  • Communicate effectively with team members and stakeholders to understand requirements and explain technical concepts.

Requirements:


  • 5-7 years of software development experience with a strong focus on iOS development using Swift.
  • Hands-on experience with web development using React.
  • Proficient in iOS development using Swift.
  • Familiarity with database management systems, particularly MongoDB.
  • Experience with Google Cloud Platform services.
  • Knowledge of CI/CD tools like Concourse.
  • Demonstrated experience in building scalable, fault-tolerant web services and APIs.
  • Strong knowledge of writing high-quality, testable, and maintainable code.
  • Excellent communication skills to effectively collaborate with team members and stakeholders.

Preferred Qualifications:


  • Experience with additional programming languages and frameworks.
  • Knowledge of other cloud platforms and services.
  • Familiarity with modern software development methodologies and Agile practices.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
